app_descript:
MICO Chat: Make New Friends & Live Chat

Brief: MICO Chat invites you to an invigorating social space ideal for forging friendships and engaging in live streaming experiences. The platform is replete with delightful stories from locals, interactive live streams from global talents, and a plethora of features encouraging connection with a friendly and entertaining online community.
